title: Out of signal Monitor Still Persist's
body: This problem wich you made in this game its rlly terrible and frustrating , this occurs kinda 1 week and 3 days , Why do you even removed the issue mark on the left corner of the client , cuz this problem its still on , NO SIGNAL ON FULL SCREEN RIOT , DO SOMETHING TO SOLVE  AS YOU DID THIS PROBLEM EITHER.{{item:3070}}

replies.body: Thee [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) cleared issues regarding the black screen or out of signal problems so it's strange that you're still having this issue.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate further and figure out what's going on.  It would also help to grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach some logs to the ticket for context.   We'll reply back as soon as we can.

Not just them, many more players. You also forget how long it takes for a ticket and not to mention you guys are putting too much faith into that HRT. I even re-installed LoL, keep getting that issue even then.

Ticket response times for tech is pretty solid right now, and I'm not sure what you mean regarding the HRT.  The HRT is a supplement for some troubleshooting steps but not a fix-it-all tool.  The thing about it that really helps everyone is that it collects logs which our team can gain better context from.  If you don't want to use the HRT for that, you can always do it manually:

[Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)
[Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)
[Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
[DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)
[Your latest R3d Log (check the date!)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7)
[Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

If you're still getting full screen errors, hit us up in a ticket so we can investigate further!
Man , every other players its experiencing this issue , so why are you trying to act like this problem occurs just on the respective person , just do something cuz you just made this problem.
